de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction

Class AbstractIndexBasedSimilarityFunction<O,I extends Index>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.AbstractIndexBasedSimilarityFunction<O,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - object type
    I - index type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexBasedSimilarityFunction<O>, SimilarityFunction<O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FractionalSharedNearestNeighborSimilarityFunction, SharedNearestNeighborSimilarityFunction

    public abstract class AbstractIndexBasedSimilarityFunction<O,I extends Index>
extends Object
implements IndexBasedSimilarityFunction<O>
    Abstract super class for distance functions needing a preprocessor.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Elke Achtert
